lead_paragraph: SHEBAIRO--Akram, born in Bagdad, Iraq January 11, 1916 to Lilwa and Kadouri Shebairo . Died April 7, 2016. He immigrated to the United States in the summer of 1939. He came to visit his sister and brothers and to enjoy the Worlds Fair. Because of the war... Jews were not allowed reentry back to Iraq. He remained here and a new chapter began. He met and married his beautiful wife Bunny in 1943. What a fantastic marriage they shared. Both enjoyed life to the fullest. He was adored by his family. He will be missed by all who knew him. To have had him in your life was a privilege. We will miss our Prince. 1/3
